src:
Berbeda dengan Bursa Asia, IHSG Dibuka Menguat ke 6.231
07 Nov 2019, 02:07 by Ardan Adhi Chandra


Foto: Rachman Haryanto

Jakarta - Indeks Harga Saham Gabungan (IHSG) dibuka positif pagi ini. IHSG menguat 12 poin (0,21%) ke level 6.231.Nilai tukar dolar Amerika Serikat (AS) terhadap rupiah pagi ini berada di level Rp 14.020.Pada pra perdagangan, IHSG naik 17 poin (0,27%) ke 6.234. Indeks LQ45 juga menguat 4 poin (0,41%) ke 992.Membuka perdagangan Kamis (7/11/2019), IHSG menguat 12 poin (0,21%) ke level 6.231. Indeks LQ45 juga naik 2,6 poin (0,27%) poin ke 990.Sementara itu, bursa Amerika Serikat (AS) ditutup Bercampur. Dow Jones ditutup 27.492,56 (-0,00%), NASDAQ ditutup 8.410,63 (-0,29%), S&P 500 ditutup 3.076,77 (+0,07%). Bursa saham AS ditutup melemah tanpa banyak pergerakan.Investor masih cemas terhadap diskusi tentang AS-China yang belum ada realisasi hingga saat ini. AS-China masih belum menentukan lokasi pertemuan dan isi dari perjanjian fase 1 secara konkret.Investor menilai peningkatan saham dalam beberapa waktu lalu tidak akan bertahan lama tanpa adanya progres dari ekonomi yang benar-benar nyata. Bursa Asia dibuka melemah mengikuti pergerakan dari indeks saham AS. Investor masih menanti perkembangan dari AS-China terkait perang dagang. Saat ini belum ada sentimen lainnya yang mendorong indeks Asia.Bursa Asia pagi ini bergerak di zona merah, berikut pergerakannya:

Indeks Nikkei 225 turun 27 poin ke 23.275
Indeks Hang Seng turun 132 poin ke 27.564
Indeks Shanghai melemah 8,9 poin ke 2.970
Indeks Strait Times turun 1,7 poin ke 3.260

text:
Unlike the Asian Stock Exchange, IHSG Opened Strengthening to 6,231
Nov 7 2019, 02:07 by Ardan Adhi Chandra


Photo: Rachman Haryanto

Jakarta - The Composite Stock Price Index (CSPI) opened positively this morning. JCI strengthened 12 points (0.21%) to 6,231. The exchange rate of the United States dollar (US) against the rupiah this morning was at the level of Rp 14,020. In pre-trade, JCI rose 17 points (0.27%) to 6,234. The LQ45 index also rose 4 points (0.41%) to 992. Opening trading on Thursday (11/07/2019), the JCI gained 12 points (0.21%) to 6,231. The LQ45 index also rose 2.6 points (0.27%) points to 990. Meanwhile, the United States (US) exchanges closed mixed. Dow Jones closed 27,492.56 (-0.00%), NASDAQ closed 8,410.63 (-0.29%), S&P 500 closed 3,076.77 (+ 0.07%). US stock markets closed lower without much movement. Investors are still worried about discussions about the US-China which has not been realized until now. The US-China has not yet determined the location of the meeting and the contents of the phase 1 agreement concretely. Investors assess that the increase in shares in the past will not last long without the progress of a real economy. Asian markets opened lower following the movements of the US stock indexes. Investors are still waiting for developments from the US-China related to the trade war. At the moment there is no other sentiment that has pushed the Asian index. Asian stocks have moved in the red zone this morning, following their movements:

The Nikkei 225 index fell 27 points to 23,275
The Hang Seng Index fell 132 points to 27,564
The Shanghai index fell 8.9 points to 2,970
The Strait Times Index fell 1.7 points to 3,260


Check out the video "Dollar Penetrates Rp. 14,200"
